verses.name: Psalms 126:1
verses.text: When the Lord turned again the captivity of Zion, we were like them that dream.

verses.name: Psalms 126:2
verses.text: Then was our mouth filled with laughter, and our tongue with singing: then said they among the heathen, The Lord hath done great things for them.

verses.name: Psalms 126:3
verses.text: The Lord hath done great things for us; whereof we are glad.

verses.name: Psalms 126:4
verses.text: Turn again our captivity, O Lord, as the streams in the south.

verses.name: Psalms 126:5
verses.text: They that sow in tears shall reap in joy.

verses.name: Psalms 126:6
verses.text: He that goeth forth and weepeth, bearing precious seed, shall doubtless come again with rejoicing, bringing his sheaves with him.
